# Welcome to Dairy Industry Insights

![Milk Nutrition](images/cow_index.jpg)

Welcome to **Dairy Industry Insights**, your go-to source for the latest trends, research, and information on the dairy industry. 

## About Us

We are a team of Biostatistics students from the Mailman School of Public health! To know more about us: <a href=About-us.html>go here</a>

<br>

## Brief Introduction of our project

Dairy Industry Insights Project
Our project delves into the dairy industry, focusing on:

<ul> 
<li>Milking Cows and Production: We compile data on milk production and cow numbers across various states.</li>

<li>Different Milk Types: We analyze the production dynamics of whole milk, 2%, 1%, and skim milk, highlighting trends and influencing factors.</li>

<li>Nutritional Analysis: We examine the nutritional content of various milk types, including fat, protein, vitamins, and minerals, offering insights into their health benefits and dietary impacts.</li>
</ul>

<br>
